name: Red Racer
description: This toy car is a great addition to any collection. It is made of durable plastic and features realistic details. Suitable for children aged 3 and above.

name: Blue Sportscar

name: Black Truck
description: This sturdy black truck is built to handle tough terrains. With its powerful wheels and durable construction, it's ready for any adventure.
